issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.customfield_12310192: HIVE-12740: NPE with HS2 when using null input format (Vikram Dixit K via Gunther Hagleitner)

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
When we have a query that returns empty rows and when using tez with hs2, we hit NPE:

fields.summary: NPE with HS2 when using null input format

comments.body:
Hmm... is this the only place where work is set, and is there any guarantee that it's the same conf?
Maybe the new path can get the setting with default null, and the old path can be made safe wrt this exception and only called if conf doesn't have a setting?
Also needs a comment that this is a hacky fix ;)
